issues.shortMessage: Rename "response" which hides the field with the same name.
issues.fullMessage: Shadowing fields with a local variable is a bad practice that reduces code readability: It makes it confusing to know whether the field or the variable is being used.

properties.title: Local variables should not shadow class fields
